thread.title: Online Marketing Leader, ReachLocal, Exhibiting at Healthcare Industry Conferences
thread.title_full: Online Marketing Leader, ReachLocal, Exhibiting at Healthcare Industry Conferences - Yahoo Finance

author: ReachLocal, Inc.
title: Online Marketing Leader, ReachLocal, Exhibiting at Healthcare Industry Conferences
text:
WOODLAND HILLS, Calif., Sept. 21, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ReachLocal Inc . ( RLOC ), a leader in powering online marketing for local businesses, announced today that it will exhibit at two upcoming healthcare industry conferences. Digital marketing experts from ReachLocal will be on hand at the Chesapeake Dental Conference and the Moments of Change Conference to meet with healthcare organizations and demonstrate digital marketing solutions.
"We've helped thousands of healthcare and wellness providers, from doctors and hospitals to dentists, assisted living homes, med spas, and wellness businesses, grow their businesses and practices," said Golda Hartman, MD and Vice President, Healthcare Division, ReachLocal. "We look forward to sharing our expertise in healthcare marketing, and over a decade of data insights, to help our clients build marketing programs that help them get more patients and customers."
Chesapeake Dental Conference, Ocean City, Maryland 
Who: Jon Camerata, Vice President of Sales, East Region, ReachLocal What: The Chesapeake Dental Conference, the 132 nd annual meeting of the Maryland State Dental Association. When and Where: Friday, September 25, 9:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., Saturday, September 26, 9:00 a.m. to 3:30 p.m. Exhibit Hall A, Booth 428, Ocean City Convention Center, 4001 Coastal Highway, Ocean City, Maryland. Click here for more information and to register for the conference. Moments of Change Conference, Palm Beach, Florida 
Who: Jon Camerata, Vice President of Sales, East Region, ReachLocal What: Moments of Change Conference covering behavioral health education. When and Where: Monday, September 28, through Thursday, October 1, 7:30 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Ponce de Leon Ballroom, Booth 9, The Breakers, 1 S. County Road, Palm Beach, Florida. Click here for more information. About ReachLocal 
ReachLocal, Inc. ( RLOC ) helps local businesses grow and operate their business better with leading technology and expert service for our clients' lead generation and conversion. ReachLocal is headquartered in Woodland Hills, Calif. and operates in four regions: Asia-Pacific, Europe, Latin America and North America.
